channel.title: 357 Magnum and SPAS sound replacement
channel.description:
Just replaced firing sounds (and bump action) of .357 and SPAS with a somewhat more powerful firing sound.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B8u1b5YEy9o[/url] - 357 [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iixWuv4p-AM[/url] - SPAS
Download link: [url]https://www.mediafire.com/?aqksilrimp6gwla[/url] Extract it to your BMS folder.
Remember to backup the original sounds in case you don't like it.
On a side note, I'm aware that spas' firing sound will cut off if you reload. And no new spas firing sound for NPCs since I couldn't get the volume of the sound right.

item.title: 357 Magnum and SPAS sound replacement
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
I want the shotgun but with a stock… So a simple re-skin I guess

item.title: 357 Magnum and SPAS sound replacement
item.dc:creator: RockmanYoshi
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

I wish someone could replace the current Spas 12 with the old Spas 12.
https://www.blackmesasource.com/media/spas_release11_001.jpg
The HL2 hand mesh and Spas 12 will always disgust me for some odd reason.

I loved the old shotgun. I also have to say I would’ve liked the old “tacticool” MP5 or an M4 better than the SMG.

Read full topic

item.title: 357 Magnum and SPAS sound replacement
item.dc:creator: ThePsycho
item.description:
Just replaced firing sounds (and bump action) of .357 and SPAS with a somewhat more powerful firing sound.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B8u1b5YEy9o - 357
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iixWuv4p-AM - SPAS

Download link: https://www.mediafire.com/?aqksilrimp6gwla
Extract it to your BMS folder.

Remember to backup the original sounds in case you don’t like it.

On a side note, I’m aware that spas’ firing sound will cut off if you reload. And no new spas firing sound for NPCs since I couldn’t get the volume of the sound right.

Read full topic
